UsageResource.name: UsageResource
UsageResource.description: Represents an entitlement granted to a user or party by a provider, such as data storage, computing power, bandwidth, or any other product or service. Additionally, this object is used to represent resources consumed over time.

Category.description: The category of the usage resource that's used to organize and understand the product grant maps.

Code.description: The unique user-defined string for the usage resource.

DefaultUnitOfMeasureId.description: The default unit of measure for the given resource. The default value can be overridden with an alternate default unit of measure for a given resource.

Description.description: The description of the usage resource.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when this record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

Name.description: The name of the usage resource record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the usage resource record.

Status.description: The status of the usage resource.

TokenResourceId.description: The usage resource of Category Token thatâ€™s used to charge this usage resource. For example, you can select a usage resource Credits (Token category) to rate the usage resource Data (Usage category). This field is available in API version 65.0 and later.

UnitOfMeasureClassId.description: The unit of measure class that's used with the resource to define the units in which this resource is measured.

UsageDefinitionProductId.description: The product associated with the usage resource to retrieve tax policy, calculate rating during overages, and other invoicing actions.

UsageResourceBillingPolicyId.description: The usage resource billing policy that defines how the usage resource can be aggregated before it's sent for rating.
